messages.title: Better hospitals. Safer streets. Improved schools.
Let's put the last three years behind us.
messages.content: Let's move on as a country and get on with our priorities.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Passing our Brexit deal, which is ready to get done. Leaving the EU by the end of January.
Providing £33.9 billion extra for the NHS.
More funding for every pupil in every school.
A growing economy that creates jobs and pays for our public services.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Last time we were just NINE seats short of a majority. This election will be just as close.

issues.economy: A growing economy that creates jobs and pays for our public services.
issues.education: More funding for every pupil in every school.
issues.health: Providing £33.9 billion extra for the NHS.

images.caption: Leaflet image with message from Boris Johnson supporting Conservative Party candidate Ranil Jayawardena.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet emphasizes the need to support the Conservative Party for better public services and to end the stagnation of the past three years.
